meanings.definition: A recording made in addition to an original recording.
meanings.sent1: The singer's overdubs enhanced the song by adding extra vocals.
meanings.sent2: The producer added overdubs to the track to make it sound fuller.
meanings.sent3: The overdubs in the song made it sound like there were more singers than there actually were.
meanings.sent4: The overdubs acted like layers of paint on a canvas, creating depth in the music.
meanings.sent5: The overdubs were like sprinkles on a cupcake, adding a little extra sweetness to the sound.

meanings.definition: To add a recording to an original recording.
meanings.sent1: She overdubs her vocals to create harmonies in the song.
meanings.sent2: The band overdubs guitar solos to make their music more dynamic.
meanings.sent3: He overdubs his voice in a funny way to make his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The artist overdubs sounds of nature to transport listeners to a different place.
meanings.sent5: Overdubbing the drums gave the track a powerful rhythm that was missing before.
